_sText:
THIS IS A BETA


After almost 1 year of work , we can release a beta for our map .
We actually know the most of the bugs , but if you find some , tell us pls.


The map is based on a after-war village , then it is partly destroyed.
We know that vending machines don't fit with the map theme , but you must see 2 different things :
- The map : The village
- The mod : vending machines , sofas and more for barricades

The map has :
- Traps
- Secrets hideouts
- A radio that play music (need to be activated , it plays everywhere in the map)
- Teleporter (only 1)
- Enought spawns
- Hidden weapons (a MG is hidden then unlimited ammo could kill the gameplay)

Prefabs used :
http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/4451
http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/4266
http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/1692

If you think you have a solution for the light bug or if you've ideas , tells us here or on the studio page.

Download, test, comment and rate pls ☺♥

Thx , 
Thomasddqâ„¢
